round_best: Develop a synthetic data generator using Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) trained on a variety of urban attributes (e.g., sociodemographics, land use, points of interest) to create diverse, realistic commuting OD flow datasets. This tool would serve as a benchmarking platform allowing researchers to test and compare the performance of their OD flow models under standardized conditions. The GANs could be trained to adaptively refine data outputs based on feedback from ongoing model evaluations, ensuring continuously improving benchmarks and model testing relevancy.
